content:
294 Benjamin Netanyahu is now being accused of bearing responsibility for the October 7th terrorist attack in Israel and for allegedly funding Hamas. posted 2 days ago by CatalystForChange 35 comments award share report block Shadow of Ezra @ShadowofEzra • 2d Benjamin Netanyahu is now being accused of bearing responsibility for the October 7th terrorist attack in Israel and for allegedly funding Hamas. Israeli Knesset member Naama Lazimi claims Netanyahu issued a stand-down order and ignored key security protocols before the attack.
35 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save BerettaStroker 30 points 2 days ago Thought this was well known at this point? permalink award report block reply Taqiyya_Mockingbird 22 points 2 days ago A country the size of New Jersey, the most significant intelligence agency on Earth, capable of blowing people up with boobytrapped pagers, and they didn’t know this attack was coming, couldn’t scramble their response for 6 hours? These people are willing to sacrifice a few of their own to endow their status as victims of a problem they created. This wouldn’t be the first time in history they have done that either. permalink parent award report block reply LordCommissarYarrick 22 points 2 days ago It should be. There's articles and stuff going back years how Netanyahu and the Israeli Government deliberately fostered Hamas as a tool to be used against the Palestinian cause and undermine Abbas. permalink parent award report block reply JackRile 13 points 2 days ago The military taking 8-hrs to respond to an attack 30-minutes away should have been everyones first clue that something wasn't quiet right permalink parent award report block reply HillarysBeaverMunch 2 points 2 days ago Yeah: What was that all about? Was anyone held accountable? I find this factoid difficult to just let go. permalink parent award report block reply y_do_i_need_to_hide 13 points 2 days ago Known and talked about are not the same thing. I mean, I know 2020 was stolen. I am hoping we will talk about it. :) permalink parent award report block reply DickTick PRO 1 points 2 days ago Yeah but should we really be parroting and championing what everybody over there calls the Israeli AOC? permalink parent award report block reply Region 5 points 2 days ago Is it the truth or is it a lie? That should be the only question.
